name: PROJECT UsER
description:
PROJECT UsER!

We are ready to tell the first story ...

We hope you can dive in and explore it.

Everyone dreamed of immortality, but what a terrible price to pay.

And how far will your ambition take you ...

An inventor who dreams of eternal life receives a very strange message.

A message that will change his whole life.

But who knows how much ...

language: English, Russian.

Words: ~5000

Endings: 11 unique endings.

If you liked the game you can support us, it will help us a lot.

 Patreon
